title: please comment this font under development
content:
hi,

I am working in a Slab serif font. I would like to have some critics.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418223402im_/http:/typophile.com/files/amostra_5985.jpg)

here's a pdf file

thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [novaFont.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418223402/http:/typophile.com/files/novaFont.pdf) | 32.32 KB |
author: rui abreu

comments.content: Quite nice, I think that the serifs are somehow weak in the figures, the ‘N’ is a tad too wide, and that you should connect the tail of the ‘Q’ ; besides the rules for the ‘€’, its bars shouldn`t be so loose.

I think your right,  
thank you for your help.

I am going to work on it.
